p: The different times and concentrations when exposing HCT-116 cells to teucrium essential oil indicate that this essence protects the cells from DNA degradation. The results above show that Teucrium induced significant caspase activation and PARP cleavage in a concentration- and time-dependent manner (Figure 4 (Aiâ€“Aii) and 4B), thus indicating that colorectal cancer cells are undergoing apoptosis.
